title: Forgot your password?
subtitle: No worries! Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
successSubtitle: We've sent a password reset link to

email.label: Email address
email.invalid: Please enter a valid email address

success.title: Email sent successfully
success.description: We've sent a password reset link to your email address. Please check your inbox.

instructions.title: Check your inbox
instructions.description: Click the link in the email to reset your password. The link will expire in 10 minutes for security reasons.
instructions.step1: Check your email inbox (and spam folder)
instructions.step2: Click the password reset link in the email
instructions.step3: Create a new password for your account
instructions.step4: Sign in with your new password

tips.title: Email not showing up?
tips.checkSpam: Check your spam or junk folder
tips.checkEmail: Make sure you entered the correct email address
tips.wait: Wait a few minutes for the email to arrive
tips.contact: If you still don't receive it, contact our support team

support.title: Need help?
support.description: If you're having trouble resetting your password, please contact our support team.
